import React, { Component } from 'react'; import BIRDS from 'vanta/dist/vanta.birds.min' import NET from 'vanta/dist/vanta.net.min' import GLOBE from 'vanta/dist/vanta.globe.min' import Typist from 'react-typist'; export default class Header extends Component { constructor() { super() this.vantaRef1 = React.createRef() this.vantaRef2 = React.createRef() } componentDidMount() { this.vantaEffect1 = GLOBE({ el: this.vantaRef1.current, backgroundAlpha:0, mouseControls: true, touchControls: true, minHeight: 200.00, minWidth: 200.00, scale: 1.00, scaleMobile: 1.00, color: 0xb13166 }) this.vantaEffect2 = NET({ el: this.vantaRef2.current, backgroundAlpha:0, mouseControls: true, touchControls: true, minHeight: 200.00, minWidth: 200.00, scale: 1.00, scaleMobile: 1.00, color: 0x3fc6ff }) } componentWillUnmount() { if (this.vantaEffect1) this.vantaEffect1.destroy() if (this.vantaEffect2) this.vantaEffect2.destroy() } render() { let resumeData = this.props.resumeData; return (
